summary: The RTP Full Funding Act of 2025 aims to increase funding for the recreational trails program (RTP) under section 206 of title 23, United States Code. The bill acknowledges the RTP's positive impact on trail infrastructure, diverse users, and national priorities. It highlights existing funding limitations and proposes that the program receive funds commensurate with fuel tax contributions from nonhighway recreational vehicles. The bill also calls for an accurate estimate of nonhighway fuel taxes and suggests funding the RTP through the Transportation Alternatives program.
